MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

NewsFeed.NewsFeed_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your RSS and Atom news feeds info into your PAD file. This info can be used by RSS feed submission software or by feed directories themselves.

Site.Site_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your site info into your PAD file. This info can be used by site submission software or by web directories themselves.
Site.Site_Description_100: Simple portable and online tool for creating multiboot usb flash drives without formatting
Site.Site_Description_250: Simple, portable and lightweight tool, lets you burn flash drive with multiple ISO. BootLine helps you to install Windows 7,8,10 or run live images like Kaspersky Rescue Disk or CloneZilla from USB stick without formatting it.
Site.Site_Description_450: Simple, portable and lightweight tool, lets you burn flash drive with multiple ISO. BootLine helps you to install Windows 7,8,10 or run live images like Kaspersky Rescue Disk or CloneZilla from USB stick without formatting it. Bootline is portable version of web service bootline.net - you can burn your multiple ISO to flash drive online in your browser.
Site.Site_Keywords: flashdrive, flash, drive, online, windowstousb, wintoflash, winlite, windows, windowtoflash, linu,x grub4dos, livecd, cd, application, format, loaders, usbstick, loaders, bootable

Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: New feedback form. Fix bugs. Full information about changes http://bootline.net/download
Program_Info.Program_System_Requirements: OS Windows, Browser Firefox/Chrome/IE9 and higher

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions: No distribution. Read EULA on http://bootline.net/eula

Press_Release.Press_Release: Out webservice allow to create bootable USB with multile ISO's online (clickonce technology for IE browsers) and downloading EXE file for Chrome and Firefox browsers and offline for Windows OS. Our application let you create bootable USB without formatting flash drive. Supports work with any flashdrive with any file system formats.
Press_Release.Headline: Creaating online bootable USB
Press_Release.Keywords: flashdrive, flash, drive, online, windowstousb, wintoflash, winlite, windows, windowtoflash, linu,x grub4dos, livecd, cd, application, format, loaders, usbstick, loaders, bootable
Press_Release.Summary: Out webservice allow to create bootable USB with multile ISO's online (clickonce technology for IE browsers) and downloading EXE file for Chrome and Firefox browsers and offline for Windows OS. Our application let you create bootable USB without form
Press_Release.Press_Release_Plain: Out webservice (http://bootline.net) allow to create bootable USB with multile ISO's online (clickonce technology for IE browsers - http://bootline.net/online) and downloading EXE file for Chrome and Firefox browsers and offline for Windows OS (http://bootline.net/download). Our application let you create bootable USB without formatting flash drive. Supports work with any flashdrive with any file system formats.

English.Keywords: windows usb, bootable usb, multiboot, bootable flash, boot usb, boot
English.Char_Desc_45: Makes miltiboot USB drive without formatting
English.Char_Desc_80: Simple portable tool for creating multiboot usb flash drives without formatting
English.Char_Desc_250: Simple, portable and lightweight tool, lets you burn flash drive with multiple ISO. BootLine helps you to install Windows 7,8,10 or run live images like Kaspersky Rescue Disk or CloneZilla from USB stick without formatting it.
English.Char_Desc_450: Simple, portable and lightweight tool, lets you burn flash drive with multiple ISO. BootLine helps you to install Windows 7,8,10 or run live images like Kaspersky Rescue Disk or CloneZilla from USB stick without formatting it. Bootline is portable version of web service bootline.net - you can burn your multiple ISO to flash drive online in your browser.
English.Char_Desc_2000: Your notebook with Windows or Linux onboard died? You need to rescue data, check for viruses, reinstall Windows on notebook to give it to your little sister? All of this actions could be done without any problems with just one bootable usb with 3-4 bootloaders on board! But creating bootable USB with several loaders may become not an easy task... And now you have to start searching for some information how to do it. You waste time, you become tired and stressed. BootLine helps you to install Windows 7,8,10 or run live images like Kaspersky or AVG Rescue Disk, CloneZilla and other from USB stick without formatting it in a few clicks! Bootline is portable version of web service bootline.net - you can burn your multiple ISO to flash drive online in your browser. Our advantages: 1. Creating Multiboot USB flash drive 2. Formatting is not required in most cases 3. Helps to find disk images 4. No Ads 5. Portable app - installation not required 6. It's possible to post message to the forum directly from app 7. Burn images to USB drive in continuous process after choosing all
